title: Per capita consumption of high fructose corn syrup in the U.S. 2000 to 2018
summary: In general Per capita consumption in pounds has fallen over the Year.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2007 and 2008.
The highest Per capita consumption in pounds, of value 62.5 was reached at Year 2002
The lowest Per capita consumption in pounds, of value 40.5 was reported at Year 2017
min_summary: Overall Per capita consumption in pounds has decreased over the Year.
